services.title: Flutter Development

services.title: Store Development and Management
services.description: I can create and manage a Shopify store for your business. By integrating pixel, google analytics, and other tools, I can help you track and analyze customer behavior, optimize your store for conversions, and grow your business online

projects.title: Autonomous System Routing
projects.description: it demonstrates the dynamic global routing behavior in a network consisting of multiple autonomous systems (AS). The nodes within each AS are connected randomly using CSMA channels, creating a dynamic network topology.
